themes: Resistance to ideological conformity in funding
Recognition of established leaders and trust-building
Support for artistic innovation and risk-taking
Critique of short-term, theme-driven funding models
key_phrases: without forcing them to contort their missions to fit current ideological trends
recognize leaders who have built trust
innovated in ways that serve the whole city
reward vision, artistic excellence, and thoughtful risk-taking
rather than short-term projects driven by theme or social alignment
barriers_identified: pressure to contort missions to fit current ideological trends
short-term, theme or social alignment-driven funding
solutions_proposed: reward vision, artistic excellence, and thoughtful risk-taking
recognize leaders who have built trust and advanced the arts
